name: A Simple Platformer?
description:
"A SImple Platformer?" is a very simple 5-level platformer game where you have to get to the end to win!

This is a project made in a little over 3 hours on scratch for a game jam called #Trijam. The theme was "There is a twist...!" and that's why there is a surprise at the end. 

This is the first time I ever implement this type of mechanic in a game and the fact that I made it in scratch doesn't help.

Here is the link to the scratch game:  https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/635454818/
